—"},{"lineNumber":82250,"originalJapaneseLine":"賑やかだったパーティー会場も、","translatedEnglishLine":"The lively party venue,"},{"lineNumber":82251,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しずつ静かになりだしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"had gradually begun to quiet down."},{"lineNumber":82252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早寝早起きの良い子ちゃん達はもう寝たか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Have the good kids who sleep early and wake early already gone to bed?"},{"lineNumber":82253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふわぁ、俺もそろそろ寝るかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yawn, maybe I should go to sleep soon too."},{"lineNumber":82254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね、","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right,"},{"lineNumber":82255,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はいつもより夜更かしさんだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"since we've stayed up later than usual today,"},{"lineNumber":82256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろ眠くなってきましたねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm starting to feel sleepy."},{"lineNumber":82257,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜が早いものは退散したが、玉座の間では、","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who sleep early had left, but in the throne room,"},{"lineNumber":82258,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだまだ兵士達が酒宴を楽しんでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the soldiers were still enjoying their party."},{"lineNumber":82259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーっ、坊主じゃねぇか！","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, isn't that the monk!"},{"lineNumber":82260,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前も呑め！　こっち来て呑め！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You drink too! Come over here and drink!"},{"lineNumber":82261,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ、酒臭っ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa, you smell like booze!"},{"lineNumber":82262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、この辺は兵士達が集まってるのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s this, are the soldiers gathered around here?"},{"lineNumber":82263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや、ランス殿。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":82264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あけましておめでとうございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"Happy New Year."},{"lineNumber":82265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、国の垣根もなく、楽しませてもらってるぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, I'm enjoying myself without any national boundaries."},{"lineNumber":82266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リックは酒じゃなくて茶だがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick is drinking tea instead of alcohol, though."},{"lineNumber":82267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ、申し訳ありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I apologize."},{"lineNumber":82268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうもこういう場でもお酒は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, even in situations like this, I can't handle alcohol..."},{"lineNumber":82269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあまあ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, well."},{"lineNumber":82270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここは代わりに僕が飲むので","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll drink in your place here,"},{"lineNumber":82271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで容赦して下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"so please forgive that."},{"lineNumber":82272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、そういうことなら仕方ねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, if that's the case, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":82273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides..."},{"lineNumber":82274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう！　リーザス代表じゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh! The representative of Leazas,"},{"lineNumber":82275,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっちのデカいのがよく飲むからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"this big guy here drinks a lot!"},{"lineNumber":82276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がっはっはっ、なーにこれくらい","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, what's this amount,"},{"lineNumber":82277,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだまだ序の口ですとも！」","translatedEnglishLine":"this is just the beginning!"},{"lineNumber":82278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ささ！　アレックス殿も！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on! Lord Alex, you too!"},{"lineNumber":82279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いえ、僕はもう……","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no, I’ve already..."},{"lineNumber":82280,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うぷ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh..."},{"lineNumber":82281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにを仰る！","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying!"},{"lineNumber":82282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　杯が空いているではありませんか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Your cup isn’t even empty!"},{"lineNumber":82283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「宴会はまだ始まったばかりですぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"The party has only just begun!"},{"lineNumber":82284,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":82285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、あっ、おととと……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, ah, woah, woah..."},{"lineNumber":82286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こ、コルドバさん、それくらいで」","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Mr. Cordoba, maybe that’s enough."},{"lineNumber":82287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、そうそう！","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, yeah, yeah!"},{"lineNumber":82288,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな楽しい日に飲まねぇなんて嘘だろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It must be a lie to not drink on such a fun day!"},{"lineNumber":82289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってわけで、ランスも飲んでけよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, Rance, you drink too."},{"lineNumber":82290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにが、ってわけで、だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you mean 'so'?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下らんものが大好きなんだ」
「さよけ」
「さて、余興を盛り上げ、王の威は示した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, the entertainment has been lively, and the king's authority has been displayed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し夜更かししすぎたし、余はそろそろ寝る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've stayed up a bit too late, so I shall go to bed soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスマスター、今年こそ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos Master, this year for sure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は余のもとに下ると予告しよう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I declare you shall come down to me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふははは！」
「はいはい、いいから寝ろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, alright, just get some sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深夜、2時――
賑やかだったパーティー会場も、
少しずつ静かになりだしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had gradually begun to quiet down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早寝早起きの良い子ちゃん達はもう寝たか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have the good kids who sleep early and wake early already gone to bed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわぁ、俺もそろそろ寝るかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yawn, maybe I should go to sleep soon too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね、
今日はいつもより夜更かしさんだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: since we've stayed up later than usual today,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ眠くなってきましたねぇ」
夜が早いものは退散したが、玉座の間では、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who sleep early had left, but in the throne room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ兵士達が酒宴を楽しんでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the soldiers were still enjoying their party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっ、坊主じゃねぇか！
お前も呑め！　こっち来て呑め！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You drink too! Come over here and drink!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっ、酒臭っ！」
「なんだ、この辺は兵士達が集まってるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What’s this, are the soldiers gathered around here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや、ランス殿。
あけましておめでとうございます」
「おう、国の垣根もなく、楽しませてもらってるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, I'm enjoying myself without any national boundaries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リックは酒じゃなくて茶だがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick is drinking tea instead of alcohol, though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ、申し訳ありません。
どうもこういう場でもお酒は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, even in situations like this, I can't handle alcohol...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ。
ここは代わりに僕が飲むので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll drink in your place here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで容赦して下さい」
「ま、そういうことなら仕方ねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, if that's the case, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに……」
「おう！　リーザス代表じゃ、
こっちのデカいのがよく飲むからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this big guy here drinks a lot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がっはっはっ、なーにこれくらい
まだまだ序の口ですとも！」
「ささ！　アレックス殿も！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on! Lord Alex, you too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いえ、僕はもう……
うぷ……」
「なにを仰る！
杯が空いているではありませんか！」
「宴会はまだ始まったばかりですぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The party has only just begun!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは！」
「あっ、あっ、おととと……
こ、コルドバさん、それくらいで」
「おう、そうそう！
こんな楽しい日に飲まねぇなんて嘘だろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It must be a lie to not drink on such a fun day!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってわけで、ランスも飲んでけよ」
「なにが、ってわけで、だ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
